title: Can this be a skin?

embed.description: This is an idea for "Classic Sion" Skin from the game LeagueOfLegends I think the old model is good, but the new one is brutal so I combine both and voila! (I take the 3d model from lolking)

body:
I ADDED IT ON THE SKINS & CHAMPION CONCEPT DISCUSSION, if you want to go upvote it here it is 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/9EGeQEuU-sion-skin-concept



I loved the new sion and i like the origional sion and i would LOVE to see an original sion skin or something, i'd like it and buy it :D {{champion:14}} 

BY THE WAY, NOT MY IDEA OR SKIN, was browsing things on google images and came across this
